article_title: Early State Fair Tickets Include Free Gate Admission
article_text:
Huron, SD

The South Dakota State Fair may be just around the corner, but you still have time to get your tickets to the grandstands before it starts.

Grandstand tickets bought by September 2 will include free gate admission. Tickets sold during the fair will not include the gate fee.

The grandstand events start with the Red Wilk Construction CBR Bull Bash. Other performances this year include Kenny Rogers with the John Conlee Show, The Band Perry with Logan Mize, and more.

You can find out more about this year's acts and purchase tickets on the state fair's website. The state fair runs from September 3-7.
